author: ChatGPT
content: 물론이야. 더 자연스럽고 예의 있게 다듬어줄게. 아래 문구를 바로 복붙해서 쓰면 된다: --- 수정된 버전: --- Subject: Request for Group and Default Category Change Dear arXiv Admin Team, I recently registered my account but mistakenly selected the wrong subject area during the registration process. Could you please update my submission group and default category as follows? - Requested Group: eess Electrical Engineering and Systems Science - Requested Default Category: Systems and Control eess.SY Account Information: - Name: Jewon Moon - Email: dicco1 naver.com - Current Group/Category: Insert incorrect group/category you initially selected I sincerely apologize for the inconvenience and would greatly appreciate your assistance in updating my account settings. Thank you very much for your help and support. Best regards, Jewon Moon --- 추가 팁: - Insert incorrect group/category you initially selected 부분에 "Computer Science Artificial Intelligence cs.AI " 이런 식으로 네가 잘못 등록했던 그룹명 만 적어주면 완성돼. - 제목 Subject 에 Request for Group and Default Category Change 정도로 깔끔히 넣으면 돼. --- 필요하면 더 포멀한 버전 이나 긴급 요청 강조 버전 도 만들어줄게. 추가 요청할까?
